explanation: Permanently wipes compressed coredump files generated by systemd-coredump without crossing filesystem boundaries.
rationale_steps: Constrain destruction to a single filesystem with -xdev to prevent unintended traversal.
Match only coredump files (*.lz4) to avoid collateral impact.
wipe overwrites blocks before unlinking to prevent data recovery.
